info.title: Conversation
info.description: The IBM Watson™ Conversation service combines machine learning, natural language understanding, and integrated dialog tools to create conversation flows between your apps and your users.

externalDocs.description: For more information about this service, see the documentation:

get.description: List the counterexamples for a workspace. Counterexamples are examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

post.description: Add a new counterexample to a workspace. Counterexamples are examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateExample object defining the content of the new user input example.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text of a user input counterexample (for example, `What are you wearing?`).

get.description: Get information about a counterexample. Counterexamples are examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

delete.description: Delete a counterexample from a workspace. Counterexamples are examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

post.description: Update the text of a counterexample. Counterexamples are examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateExample object defining the new text for the counterexample.

get.description: List the entities for a workspace.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateEntity object defining the content of the new entity.

get.description: Get information about an entity, optionally including all entity content.

post.description: Update an existing entity with new or modified data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateEntity object defining the updated content of the entity.

delete.description: Delete an entity from a workspace.

get.description: List the values for an entity.

post.description: Create a new value for an entity.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateValue object defining the content of the new value for the entity.

get.description: Get information about an entity value.

post.description: Update the content of a value for an entity.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateValue object defining the new content for value for the entity.

delete.description: Delete a value for an entity.

get.description: List the synonyms for an entity value.

post.description: Add a new synonym to an entity value.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateSynonym object defining the new synonym for the entity value.

parameters.name: synonym
parameters.description: The text of the synonym.

get.description: Get information about a synonym for an entity value.

post.description: Update the information about a synonym for an entity value.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateSynonym object defining the new information for an entity value synonym.

delete.description: Delete a synonym for an entity value.

get.description: List the intents for a workspace.

intents.description: User wants to start a new pizza order

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateIntent object defining the content of the new intent.

application/json.description: User wants to start a new pizza order

get.description: Get information about an intent, optionally including all intent content.

application/json.description: User wants to start a new pizza order

delete.description: Delete an intent from a workspace.

post.description: Update an existing intent with new or modified data. You must provide JSON data defining the content of the updated intent.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateIntent object defining the updated content of the intent.

application/json.description: User wants to start a new pizza order

get.description: List the user input examples for an intent.

post.description: Add a new user input example to an intent.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A CreateExample object defining the content of the new user input example.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text of the user input example.

get.description: Get information about a user input example.

delete.description: Delete a user input example from an intent.

post.description: Update the text of a user input example.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An UpdateExample object defining the new text for the user input example.

post.description: Create a workspace based on component objects. You must provide workspace components defining the content of the new workspace.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Valid JSON data defining the content of the new workspace.

get.description: List the workspaces associated with a Conversation service instance.
Get information about a workspace, optionally including all workspace content.

post.description: Update an existing workspace with new or modified data. You must provide component objects defining the content of the updated workspace.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Valid JSON data defining the new workspace content. Any elements included in the new JSON will completely replace the existing elements, including all subelements. Previously existing subelements are not retained unless they are included in the new JSON.

delete.description: Delete a workspace from the service instance.

post.summary: Get a response to a user's input

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the workspace.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The user's input, with optional intents, entities, and other properties from the response.

log_messages.msg: No dialog node matched for the input at a root level!

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A cacheable parameter that limits the results to those matching the specified filter.

input.text: Can you turn off the AC
Can you turn off the AC

text: Hi. It looks like a nice drive today. What would you like me to do?

CursorQueryParam.name: cursor
CursorQueryParam.description: A token identifying the last value from the previous page of results.

ExportQueryParam.name: export
ExportQueryParam.description: Whether to include all element content in the returned data. If export=`false`, the returned data includes only information about the element itself. If export=`true`, all content, including subelements, is included. The default value is `false`.

IncludeCountQueryParam.name: include_count
IncludeCountQueryParam.description: Whether to include information about the number of records returned.

PageLimitQueryParam.name: page_limit
PageLimitQueryParam.description: The number of records to return in each page of results. The default page limit is 100.

SortQueryParam.name: sort
SortQueryParam.description: Sorts the response according to the value of the specified property, in ascending or descending order.

ValuePathParam.name: value
ValuePathParam.description: The text of the entity value.

VersionQueryParam.name: version
VersionQueryParam.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the entity.

fuzzy_match.description: Whether to use fuzzy matching for the entity.

text.description: The text of the user input example.

alternate_intents.description: Whether to return more than one intent. `true` indicates that all matching intents are returned.

value.description: The text of the entity value.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the entity value.

Context.description: Context information for the message. Include the context from the previous response to maintain state for the conversation.

conversation_id.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

counterexamples.description: An array of ExampleResponse objects describing the examples marked as irrelevant input.

CreateDialogNode.description: An object describing a dialog node.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the value.

fuzzy_match.description: Whether to use fuzzy matching for the entity.

text.description: The text of a user input example.

examples.description: An array of user input examples.

value.description: The text of the entity value.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the entity value.

synonyms.description: Any array of synonyms for the entity value.

dialog_nodes.description: An array of objects describing the dialog nodes in the workspace.

DialogNodeResponse.description: An object describing a dialog node.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the entity.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the entity.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the entity.

fuzzy_match.description: Whether fuzzy matching is used for the entity.

examples.description: An array of user input examples.
An array of ExampleResponse objects describing the examples defined for the intent.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the example.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the example.

InputData.description: An object defining the user input.

text.description: The text of the user input.

examples.description: An array of user input examples for the intent.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the intent.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the intent.

log_id.description: A unique identifier for the logged message.

request_timestamp.description: The timestamp for receipt of the message.

response_timestamp.description: The timestamp for the system response to the message.

MessageInput.description: An input object that includes the input text.

MessageRequest.description: A request formatted for the Conversation service.

alternate_intents.description: Whether to return more than one intent. Set to `true` to return all matching intents.

entities.description: Include the entities from the previous response when they do not need to change and to prevent Watson from trying to identify them.

intents.description: An array of name-confidence pairs for the user input. Include the intents from the previous response when they do not need to change and to prevent Watson from trying to identify them.

MessageResponse.description: A response from the Conversation service.

OutputData.description: An output object that includes the response to the user, the nodes that were hit, and messages from the log.

log_messages.description: Up to 50 messages logged with the request.

nodes_visited.description: The nodes that were executed to create the response.

PaginationResponse.description: The pagination data for the returned objects.

refresh_url.description: The URL that will return the same page of results.

next_url.description: The URL that will return the next page of results.

conversation_id.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

RuntimeEntity.description: A term from the request that was identified as an entity.

entity.description: The recognized entity from a term in the input.

location.description: Zero-based character offsets that indicate where the entity value begins and ends in the input text.

value.description: The term in the input text that was recognized.

confidence.description: A decimal percentage that represents Watson's confidence in the entity.

RuntimeIntent.description: An intent identified in the user input.

intent.description: The name of the recognized intent.

confidence.description: A decimal percentage that represents Watson's confidence in the intent.

level.description: The severity of the message (info, error, or warn).

text.description: An array of responses to the user.

log_messages.description: Up to 50 messages logged with the request

nodes_visited.description: An array of the nodes that were triggered to create the response.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the synonym.

updated.description: The timestamp for the most recent update to the synonym.

value.description: The text of the entity value.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the entity value.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the entity value.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the entity value.

intents.description: An array of objects defining the intents for the workspace.

entities.description: An array of objects defining the entities for the workspace.

dialog_nodes.description: An array of objects defining the nodes in the workspace dialog.

counterexamples.description: An array of objects defining input examples that have been marked as irrelevant input.

metadata.description: Any metadata related to the workspace.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the workspace.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the workspace.

metadata.description: Any metadata that is required by the workspace.
Any metadata that is required by the workspace.

created.description: The timestamp for creation of the workspace.

updated.description: The timestamp for the last update to the workspace.

status.description: The current status of the workspace.
